subtitles: 16083 18291 First, there was darkness.
19763 22548 Then came the Strangers.

22580 25204 They were a race
as old as time itself.

26260 28851 They had mastered
the ultimate technology--

28852 33939 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

33940 36436 They called this ability
''Tuning.''
37588 39381 But they were dying.

39411 42292 Their civilization was
in decline,

42356 44949 and so they abandoned
their world,

45013 47541 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

48885 52276 Their endless journey brought
them to a small, blue world...

52277 54294 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy.
55286 56694 Our world.

57685 59668 Here, they thought
they had finally found...

59669 61526 what they had been
searching for.

71893 74677 My name is
Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.
75607 77174 l am just a man.

77240 80358 l help the Strangers
conduct their experiments.
81431 83382 l have betrayed my own kind.
282369 284098 You are confused, aren't you?

284130 286850 Frightened. That's all right.
l can help you.

286851 288355 -Who is this?
-l'm a doctor.

288417 291073 You must listen to me.
You have lost your memory.

291074 293154 There was an experiment.
Something went wrong.

293155 295265 Your memory was erased.
Do you understand me?

295266 297281 No, l don't understand.
What's going on here?

297282 300001 There are people coming for you
as we speak.

300002 302210 Don't let them find you.
Leave now.
303330 305411 Hello? Are you there?

345862 348230 Hey, Mr. Murdoch,
the Automat called.
348262 349702 Said you left your wallet there.

350726 354245 l suggest you retrieve it, since
you only paid for three weeks,
354246 355942 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
357926 359334 l've been here three weeks?

359366 362438 lt's right there
in black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
362439 364743 Day and date.

364775 368005 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

368006 370918 -l'll take care of it later.
-See that you do.

370919 372997 Only thing makes you a guest
in this joint...
372998 374311 is cash on the barrelhead!

391463 394120 House rules.
Three weeks is three weeks.
394121 396519 No days off for good behavior.

407016 410504 Mr. Murdoch, yes?
Where is he?

410568 413866 He just left
not five minutes ago.

419369 423209 When the rumba rhythm
start to play
423273 425322 Dance with me
425387 428297 Make me sway
428361 432138 Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
432202 434347 Hold me close
434379 437098 Sway me more

437130 441227 Like a flower bending
in the breeze
441259 443595 Bend with me
443627 446347 Sway with ease

446379 450155 When we dance,
you have a way with me
450219 452587 Stay with me
452619 455051 Sway with me

455821 459754 Hey, sweetie, he said he was
your husband's doctor.
459755 461228 He wanted to speak with you.

483725 485197 -Doctor...
-Schreber.

485261 489501 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

490414 493708 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
493709 495117 What is this?

495149 498636 A rather crude experiment
designed to further my studies.

498637 502190 l don't understand. You say
you're my husband's doctor,

502191 504623 but he never
mentioned you to me.

504687 507407 The truth is, John has been
coming to see me...
507408 508782 for quite some time.

508814 512078 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

512079 515053 stemming from
your marital difficulties.

515054 516879 -John told you what happened.
-Yes.

518223 520430 When was the last time
that you saw him?

520431 523216 Three weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.
523248 525616 He was very angry at me.

525680 528431 l understand how difficult
this must be for you,
528432 529744 but for John's sake,

529776 532624 l would like you to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

532625 536174 lt appears that John
has suffered a psychotic break.

536175 539215 -Complete memory loss.
-You can't be serious.

539216 542065 Oh, but l am.
He may be delusional.
542097 543281 Even violent.

544625 548432 lf he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

548433 551201 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
552496 553618 For himself.

563410 567522 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
lt is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
568049 571345 Mr. ''J'' something Murdoch?

574578 578979 J. Murdoch. What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

582707 584691 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

584755 587619 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
593331 594996 Got to get a grip on myself.

618132 621365 l told the guy,
cash on the barrelhead.

621397 624595 l said, ''Listen,
three weeks is three weeks.''

624596 628422 -Where's our lucky winner?
-Upstairs, sir. Room 614.
629238 630516 The call girl.

634965 637781 -Evening, Husselbeck.
-lnspector Bumstead.
637782 639413 Your lace is untied.
649942 651415 Am l glad you're here, sir.

651479 654038 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

654039 656518 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

685785 688185 -Thanks a lot.
-Excuse me.

690553 692216 -Hello?
-Oh, it's you.

692953 695576 -You left your wallet here.
-When did l do that?

695577 697720 -When you was last here.
-When was that?

697721 701386 When you left your wallet.
Expect me to remember?

706553 709210 -Excuse me!
-No, no, seriously.

725883 727642 -Where you headed, chief?
-Home.
727676 728954 And where's home?

728986 731674 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?
731675 733850 l'm just doing my job, May.
733882 735835 There's a killer out there.

735900 738828 Look for him
instead of cooling your heels.
741627 743260 Go on. Get out of here.

755997 758714 What's that make so far?
Six hookers in all?

758715 761900 -l believe so, sir.
-Give the man an ''A'' for effort.
766684 768894 So, Husselbeck,

768924 775165 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

775166 776989 -Got me, sir.
-Bumstead.

777021 780187 What took you? This killer's
been running circles around us,
780188 781246 thanks to Walenski.

781310 783037 With all due respect,
Chief lnspector,

783069 786045 l've known Eddie a long time,
and he's a good cop.

786046 788221 Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
788222 790079 he let drift a long time ago.
790111 791808 Let me talk to Bumstead!
791838 793791 Come on! Hold on!

798527 800480 -Get his arm !
-They're watching us!

800544 802720 -On your feet!
-There's no way out!
804064 805662 God, can't you see?

808960 811232 Let me go!
l'm not going to hurt you.

812704 814783 -What was that?
-Walenski.

822881 825856 l'm being punished
for my sins, right?

825920 830080 What did l ever do to inherit
this? Where do you begin?

830081 832928 Well, everything Detective
Walenski committed to paper...
832929 834306 should be here, so--

834338 837234 The only thing that should be
committed is Walenski.

839073 840866 Nothing like
a little healthy paranoia.

847139 850369 l came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.

850370 854065 -Take it to the front desk.
-They told me to come see you.
855841 857410 His name's John Murdoch.

860386 863586 Do these names mean
anything to you?
864387 866274 Who are these women?

866306 868099 Why are you looking
for my husband?

868131 870338 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

870339 873730 -Maybe. Maybe murder.
-Whose murder?

875107 878212 -Which one?
-All of them.

879586 882786 Mrs. Murdoch, l am sorry.
l didn't mean to alarm you.

882787 885443 l'm sorry that l came.
l just made a mistake.

885444 889460 lf you'd please just give me
half a second to explain.
898052 899236 We met before?

900869 903811 lf we did,
l hope you're still breathing.
903812 905316 What's your name, honey?

908964 910661 Well, that's
an appropriate name.
918278 919526 l was just thinking.

926215 931110 lt seems kind of dangerous...
right now.

931111 932966 How do you know
l'm not the killer?

932998 936535 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

937031 939512 You feeling any urges
l should know about?

997578 1001321 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1001322 1005370 -Who are you?
-We might ask the same question.

1084720 1087790 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1087791 1090831 -lt is said he is able to Tune.
-lmpossible!

1090832 1093742 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1093807 1096558 On occasion, the imprinting
does not take.

1096559 1099022 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1099023 1102576 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1102577 1104624 But this one was different, yes?

1104689 1108303 -What has the doctor to say?
-He has failed to report in.

1108304 1111279 -And Mr. Quick?
-No more Mr. Quick.
1111343 1113842 Mr. Quick...dead, yes.
1117105 1119601 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1119665 1122482 Mr. Book...does he know?
1123441 1125393 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1126384 1129200 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1129201 1132049 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1132050 1134225 We must have this man.
1139922 1141010 My brand, l hope.
1152852 1154354 l've been worried about you.
1158227 1159507 Are you punishing me?

1160242 1162803 lf disappearing is
your way of punishing me,
1162804 1163924 l don't appreciate it.
1163986 1165076 What are you talking about?

1168467 1172515 l found these keys in my pocket,
so l assume l live here.

1174195 1176837 -You supposed to be my wife?
-''Supposed to be''?

1179828 1184068 You really...don't know
who l am, do you.

1184500 1187219 Your doctor called me. He was
worried that this might happen.

1191285 1195205 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1202261 1204245 Feel like l'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1204246 1207333 What happened to me?
Why was l seeing a doctor?
1207478 1208918 l had an affair.
1210741 1212053 You were angry at me.

1215094 1218582 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.
1227927 1230167 Most unfortunate it is...

1230199 1232807 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1233336 1237703 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1238168 1241366 -l'm sorry. l--
-Failed to report in, yes?

1241367 1244215 l was frightened.
l have a weak heart, you know.

1244216 1247639 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1247640 1250168 We found this in his hotel room.

1250232 1253655 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1253656 1255673 l tried to reprint him,
but he woke up.

1255737 1257880 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.

1257881 1260985 -He has no memories, then?
-Only fragments.

1260986 1262424 The procedure,
it was interrupted.

1262488 1265448 l guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1265786 1267416 You have had strays
before, right?

1267480 1271224 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can Tune.

1271225 1274200 But that's impossible.
Only you have that ability.

1274201 1276409 You will process
another template...
1276441 1278394 of the subject's memories, yes?

1278458 1279931 Of course.
l'll imprint him again.

1281497 1284634 We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1284635 1287323 lt's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1287355 1289145 We'll talk again
after tonight's Tuning,
1289146 1291963 but no more delays, yes?

1291995 1297002 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1298395 1299962 The police were looking for you.
1300026 1302075 l know. l saw the papers.

1302139 1304507 ''Killer stalks
city street-walkers.''
1307995 1310205 l was with one of those women.

1311675 1315004 -Before l came here tonight.
-l don't understand.

1315005 1320140 l met her outside an Automat.
l guess l wanted to test myself.

1321373 1324668 l wanted to know if l had it
in me to do those things.
1324669 1326077 Maybe l have lost my mind,

1326141 1329388 but whoever l am, l'm still me,
and l'm not a killer.
1334781 1336029 l believe you.

1343389 1345278 -What?
-The car outside.
1345341 1346717 The one you arrived in.

1346751 1348959 lt's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1351038 1352703 l didn't know he was still here.
1356158 1357567 Hold it right there, mister!

1359870 1362814 -Wait. You have the wrong man.
-Stand aside, will you, please?
1362815 1364224 l didn't kill anyone.

1364254 1366461 Right now,
all you are is a suspect.

1366495 1369597 Turn yourself in. l'll listen
to whatever you have to say.

1369598 1371584 You won't believe
what l have to say.

1372704 1375807 -Try me.
-There's someone after me.

1375871 1379392 lt's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1379393 1382174 And l don't even know if...
they're not even--

1382175 1384350 Yeah, who's going to listen
to a madman?

1384351 1386721 -Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
-Run!
1390879 1392769 No one ever listens to me.
1398817 1399808 Murdoch, stop!

1440962 1443572 -How much further?
-We're almost there, buddy.

1446595 1448898 You happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1448899 1451875 You're kidding! Me and the wife
spent our honeymoon there.

1451876 1454676 All you do is
take Main Street West to...

1457157 1460291 Or is it the Cross...
Now, that's funny.

1460292 1463332 l can't seem to remember
if it's Main Street West...
1463333 1464581 or the Crosstown.

1469060 1472036 l'm sorry, lnspector,
l cannot be of more assistance,

1472037 1473955 but l am running late
for an appointment.

1473956 1476006 Well, l appreciate you
taking the time.

1484389 1486693 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1486725 1491141 l've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1491142 1493701 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1493765 1496869 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1496870 1499654 Well, l do know when
someone is lying to me, Doctor.

1499655 1503718 lnspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1503719 1505606 Maybe you can give me
a few pointers.

1505670 1509478 Certainly.
Let's take you, for instance.

1509479 1512456 You are a fastidious man.
Driven.
1512520 1514727 Consumed by details.

1514759 1518087 l would say
your life is rather lonely.

1518151 1520983 Good evening, lnspector.
l really must be going.

1562698 1564393 -How is he?
-The same.
1565643 1568171 Walenski? lt's me, Frank.
1574313 1575435 Come in, Frank.
1578570 1579722 Close the door.

1587467 1590667 l've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1590668 1592652 lt's an interesting case.
1593739 1596780 Kind that make a man's career.

1598445 1601994 -Or break it.
-Yeah. l was on that case.

1601995 1605708 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1605709 1607085 Nothing happened, Frank.

1608045 1610027 l've just been spending time
in the subway,
1610028 1611853 riding in circles.

1611885 1615677 Thinking in circles.
There's no way out.
1617452 1619053 l've been over this entire city.

1623372 1625228 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1625229 1626637 She's not my wife.

1628428 1631308 l don't know who she is
or who any of us are.

1631309 1634942 -What makes you say that?
-You think about the past much?
1636526 1637934 As much as the next guy.

1638926 1641581 See, l've been trying
to remember things--

1641582 1644527 clearly remember things
from my past.

1644589 1646638 But the more
l try to think back,

1646703 1649551 the more it all starts
to unravel.
1649615 1650703 None of it seems real.

1650767 1654797 lt's like l've just
been dreaming this life,

1654798 1657678 and when l finally wake up,
l'll be somebody else,
1657679 1659568 somebody totally different.

1663791 1665840 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie.
1666960 1669360 Something to do with the case.

1669937 1673200 There is no case!
There never was!

1673232 1676976 lt's all just a big joke!
lt's a joke!
1716371 1718002 Tonight's requirements are...
1718066 1721171 12 family photo albums,
1721235 1723539 nine personal diaries,
1725682 1727986 assorted childhood photographs,

1728018 1732082 requisite false l.D.s
and social security cards.
1732083 1734229 These do bring back memories.
1736532 1738676 This one is still warm.

1740597 1743636 The recollections of
a great lover?
1743700 1745908 A catalogue of conquests?
1746611 1748021 We will soon find out.

1749269 1750676 You wouldn't
appreciate that,

1750740 1753813 would you,
Mr. Whatever-your-name is?

1753877 1758406 Not the sort of conquest
you would ever understand.

1761237 1763797 A touch of
unhappy childhood...

1769270 1771732 A dash of
teenage rebellion...
1773269 1776214 And last but not least...

1776278 1778742 a tragic death
in the family.

1789782 1793269 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the Tuning?

1793270 1797397 Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.
1797398 1798518 A freak of nature.

1798582 1801366 He's adapting to survive.
What do you expect?

1801367 1803192 Weren't you looking for
the human soul?

1803224 1805781 lsn't that the purpose
of your little zoo?

1805782 1809015 That's why you change people
and things every night.

1809016 1811831 Maybe you have finally
found what you are looking for,

1811832 1813305 and it's going to bite you
on your--

1817175 1819063 lt requires several
of your lifetimes...
1819064 1820633 to master our gifts.

1820697 1822458 The idea that
a simple man...

1822488 1824377 could develop the ability
to Tune is--
1824441 1825497 Absurd, l know.
1825561 1827768 What other explanation is there?
1877691 1879067 Shut it down.

1896860 1899868 Fredrickson says he'll take me
off the night shift.
1899869 1901660 lt's about time, dear.
1974624 1976674 Can anyone hear me?
1979715 1982433 Let the Tuning commence.
2135755 2137065 The Goodwins.
2137098 2138987 Charlie, Sylvia,
2139051 2141034 Jane, and little Matthew.
2144778 2146860 Jane and little Matthew.
2175821 2177933 The rich get richer.

2177997 2180012 Probably have
maid's quarters...

2180076 2181388 before the night
is through.
2232751 2234640 Dr. Schreber, l presume.

2237200 2239247 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor,
2239248 2241295 if that's what you are.
2242767 2244496 Why is everyone asleep?
2244560 2246864 Please keep your voice down.

2246896 2248784 l can't remember anything.
What have you done?
2248785 2251440 Nothing. l want to help you.

2251504 2254800 We cannot talk here.
lf they see us together--

2254801 2257586 l don't care.
l want some answers. Now!

2257618 2260656 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?

2267664 2270577 -You really can do it.
-l did that?

2270641 2273105 Listen to me.
You have their power.

2273169 2275090 You can make things happen
by will alone.
2275091 2276593 They call it ''Tuning.''

2276657 2278546 That is how they change
the buildings.

2278578 2280978 Just now you acted
out of self-defense,

2281042 2283730 but l can teach you
to control your power.

2283731 2287939 We can stop them.
We can take the city back.

2344182 2346453 He made a terrible impression
for the firm,

2346454 2349175 lollygagging around
as he did.

2349205 2352022 So l told Fredrickson
l was letting him go.
2352023 2353910 Well you should have, darling.

2354646 2357958 He attacked me.
l don't know where he's gone.

2358071 2361847 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2366711 2372856 They say that
you're a runaround lover
2373911 2381592 Though you say it isn't so

2384409 2390969 But if you put me down
for another
2392504 2398137 l'll know, believe me, l'll know

2399545 2402968 Tonight's experiment will
take place in these locations.

2402969 2406873 The first subject
shall be imprinted on Avenue M.
2406874 2409722 Mr. Book, there is a problem.
2409786 2411289 There is no Avenue M.

2411355 2413146 We were unable
to complete it.

2413178 2416568 During the last Tuning,
we detected a lack of control.

2416569 2419643 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2419707 2423800 This man Murdoch is
more powerful than we thought.
2423801 2425658 He is becoming like us.
2425690 2428986 So we must become like him.
2429883 2432123 The doctor has done as we asked?

2432155 2436075 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume two.
2437628 2440092 We must not do this.

2440156 2443419 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2443420 2446171 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2446172 2449499 Everywhere he goes,
everyone he seeks out...
2449500 2450684 will be known to us.

2450748 2455707 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.
2455708 2458044 But to imprint one of us?
2458076 2460636 Failure has always resulted.

2460700 2464157 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2470909 2472764 This may sting a bit.
2511808 2515488 l have John Murdoch in mind.

2517696 2521565 ''Found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2521566 2523680 ''Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
2523744 2525505 ''Stop by sometime.

2525567 2528735 ''We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.
2528736 2530976 ''Love to Emma. Karl.''
2538977 2540545 Karl Harris.

2557345 2560258 Excuse me.
Which way is Avenue C?
2560322 2561474 Try the subway.
2565090 2566498 You got a problem, pal?
2566562 2569283 Been working here long?

2569315 2572914 25 years.
No days off for good behavior.
2596644 2599460 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2632262 2634246 She knows nothing,
Mr. Hand.
2634310 2636071 A dead end, Mr. Wall.

2636135 2638790 We thought his imprint
would let us track him.

2638791 2641191 But instead
we have been brought here.

2641255 2645159 -This is irrational.
-lnstincts are irrational.

2645160 2648295 We must follow
where they lead, yes?

2648359 2651527 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar.
2652840 2654759 He does not care about our job.
2654824 2657544 lndulge us, Mr. Hand.
2657576 2660104 lf you were Murdoch, yes?
2660168 2663368 lf l were Murdoch...

2665096 2668487 l would remember how
my wife had hurt me...
2668488 2670407 by sleeping with another man.

2675209 2678872 l would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2681385 2686136 Leave me alone with her.
There's work to be done.

2689288 2691274 All change,
platform three.

2694986 2697224 Excuse me, how do l get
to the end of the line?
2697225 2698634 You want the Express.
2710730 2713097 How come the train didn't stop?
2713132 2714346 That's the Express.
2715850 2717675 There's no way out.

2717707 2720828 You can't get out of the city.
l've tried.
2721483 2723467 You're Murdoch, aren't you?

2723531 2725099 The one
they've been looking for.
2725163 2726219 You're not a killer.

2726283 2728875 They set you up with
a fake identity,
2728940 2730476 like everyone else here.

2730540 2732363 -Who are you?
-l was a cop.
2732395 2735372 At least in this life l was.
2735436 2738189 They steal peoples' memories.

2738221 2739916 Then they swap them around
between us.

2739980 2742540 l seen them do it,
back and forth...

2742604 2744619 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2744683 2745899 How do you know all this?

2745964 2747660 Once in a while one of us
wakes up...
2747724 2749101 while they're changing things.

2749964 2752397 lt's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
2752398 2753644 lt happened to me.
2754349 2756172 They'll come looking for you.

2757260 2759470 Just like they'll come
looking for me.
2760908 2762060 l figured a way out.
2773038 2774222 They were here.
2777646 2779759 This was to be his home.
2782317 2784046 That was when we loved her.
2784110 2786286 This is all well and good,

2786350 2788271 but we require
a more practical link...
2788335 2790286 to his present whereabouts.
2794736 2796655 And l know where to find her.

2804784 2807983 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2809007 2810961 To be able to revisit

2811025 2812912 which meant

2813743 2816145 l thought we were haunted

2817904 2820303 There used to be a ferry

2820304 2822257 Biggest thing you ever saw.

2822321 2825010 Lit up like

2826384 2828881 That's just what my husband

2828882 2830352 On this very spot.
2831793 2833778 Where is your husband now?

2837552 2840305 l met my wife at this place.

3032124 3033629 l looked after you.

3223527 3226376 He's here.

3350863 3354478 Different eras, different pasts,

3622206 3625053 lt's all of us. They're doing

3639518 3642142 There has to be an explanation.

3676481 3678144 l wish l could take it back.

3681088 3682721 This affair of yours,

3682785 3685727 whatever you think you've done,

3699681 3702273 And everything you remember,

3999506 4002242 Don't you understand?

4010771 4015428 l don't understand.

4046870 4049078 -Anna.

4050711 4052662 You will be soon, yes.

4068598 4070423 l call them Strangers.

4074456 4078742 This city, everyone in it...

4078743 4081366 They mix and match our memories

4081367 4083895 trying to divine

4084408 4087095 One day, a man might be

4087159 4089817 The next,

4090200 4093526 When they want to study

4093527 4097847 they simply imprint one of their

4097848 4101976 Arrange a family for him,

4101977 4103736 even a lost wallet.

4115001 4119754 This business of you being

4119993 4122520 You have had dozens of lives

4122521 4123897 You happened to wake up...

4123929 4126681 while l was imprinting you

4126682 4128571 Why are they doing all this?

4128633 4132633 lt is our capacity for

4132634 4134362 that makes us different

4134427 4136825 They think they'll find

4136826 4139450 if they understand

4139451 4143771 They have collective memories.

4143772 4148475 They're dying. Their race is

4148476 4151419 -They think we can save them.

4151420 4156140 You're different. You resisted

4160475 4163836 Somehow, you have developed

4163837 4167003 That is how they change things,

4167004 4169820 They have machines buried

4169821 4173580 that allow them to focus

4173916 4176477 They control everything here,

4176478 4179580 That's why it's always dark.

4179581 4180925 Why do they need you?
4180989 4182876 When they first brought us here,

4182908 4187068 they extracted what was in us

4187069 4188924 remixed it like paint...

4188958 4191421 and gave us back

4191422 4195278 But they still needed an artist

4196575 4201374 l understood the human mind

4201375 4204861 so they allowed me to keep

4204862 4206207 because they needed them.

4206271 4208575 They made me delete
everything else.

4216830 4221182 Can you imagine what it's like

4221183 4224654 What about my past?

4225152 4227103 Shell Beach. Uncle Karl.

4228287 4232255 What about this?

4232256 4235999 You still don't understand.

4236000 4237216 Not in this place.

4237280 4240095 Your history is an illusion,

4240096 4241823 as it is with all of us.

4241887 4244350 You made those drawings happen

4244351 4245762 You say they brought us here.

4256578 4260641 None of us remember that...

4260642 4264434 what we might have been...

4281122 4284771 l've taken you this far.

4329253 4331397 There is no ocean, John.
4332645 4334694 There's nothing beyond the city.
4336263 4338631 The only place home exists...
4340774 4342279 is in your head.
4387753 4389769 Now you know the truth.

4446891 4449453 You'll allow yourself

4449515 4451693 or it will result in

4451757 4452877 What do l care?

4453323 4455372 She's not my real wife.

4455373 4459883 But you do still care,

4459884 4464349 l have become the monster

4465870 4469630 Shall l end her life now,

4472653 4478109 -Don't hurt her, please.

4530993 4534000 what the doctor calls the soul.

4534064 4537904 lt is time for our experiment

4537905 4540561 We no longer need

4540625 4543826 The time for study is over.

4543890 4548017 lt is time to be one

4554578 4557779 lt is time, Doctor. lmprint.
4560337 4562419 Shut it down!
4563314 4565586 Shut it down forever.
4579667 4580691 What are you doing?

4587156 4589235 They want to make you

4589299 4591381 so they can share your soul.
4591445 4593652 But l've got other plans.

4596916 4599636 lmprint, Doctor.

4599700 4604550 l'm sorry. The pain will

4614837 4616438 Remember, John.

4617429 4619446 You'll rise to greater heights

4619447 4622181 One day when you're older,

4625334 4628086 That's it, John.

4628087 4631542 Now, remember what l told you.

4631543 4632823 John, remember.

4633045 4635733 You're probably wondering why l

4635734 4638100 lt's because l have

4638101 4641975 They were fabricated to

4641976 4645319 Give you a lifetime of knowledge

4647671 4652184 You will survive, John. You'll

4652185 4653655 And you will prevail.

4656087 4658201 -Hi, Uncle Karl.

4661047 4665384 Getting the hang of it, John.

4665593 4669111 Here's the machine the Strangers

4669112 4670777 the machine that changes

4670839 4674008 You must take control of it.

4674009 4678794 l know you can beat them,

4680345 4681497 Something's wrong.
4689945 4691738 There is no time for romance.

4691802 4693785 The world can be

4694779 4695770 What have you done?

4696826 4698937 You have the power

4698938 4700763 but you must act now.

4977610 4980186 -You control their machines.

4985195 4987401 -So give her back her memories.

4999180 5000588 l'm gonna fix things.

5006251 5009500 l can make these machines

5010092 5012443 Make this world

5013259 5017533 Just so long as l concentrate

5101905 5102834 Shell Beach.

5142548 5143956 -What's the fare?

5209943 5215543 l'm dying, John. Your imprint

5215544 5217623 But l wanted to know

5219288 5220824 How you feel.

5223511 5227415 That person isn't me.

5231608 5235592 Well, you're not going to

5333662 5335359 lt's so beautiful here.
